sentences.en: A lawyer should provide disinterested advice.
sentences.cn: 律师应该提供客观公正的建议。

sentences.en: He had thought himself the most disinterested person in the world.
sentences.cn: 他一直认为他是世界上最无私的人了.

sentences.en: He was now playing the role of disinterested host and avuncular mentor.
sentences.cn: 他现在正扮演着慷慨的主人和伯父似的指导人的角色.

sentences.en: He's always on the make; I have never known him do a disinterested action.
sentences.cn: 他这个人一贯都是唯利是图, 我从来不知道他有什么无私的行动.

sentences.en: Her mother too had always been a little disinterested in her, holding her at arm's length.
sentences.cn: 她母亲对她听之任之,冷冷淡淡的.这会儿, 她母亲还同往常一样.

sentences.en: His action was not altogether disinterested.
sentences.cn: 他的行动并不完全公正.

sentences.en: I am quite sure that he acted in this matter from disinterested motives.
sentences.cn: 我十分相信,他在这个问题上这样做是出于无私的动机.

sentences.en: John has no interest in his studies. He disinterested.
sentences.cn: 约翰对他的课没半点兴趣,他不感兴趣.

sentences.en: Lili had clearly regained her appetite but Doran was disinterested in food.
sentences.cn: 莉莉显然已经恢复了食欲，但多兰却提不起胃口。

sentences.en: Scientists, of course, can be expected to be impartial and disinterested.
sentences.cn: 当然，人们会认为科学家们理所当然是公正客观的。

sentences.en: Such benevolence, however, was not completely disinterested.
sentences.cn: 然而这样的善举并非完全出于大公无私。

sentences.en: The counselor gave us some disinterested advice.
sentences.cn: 顾问给了我们一些无私的忠告.

sentences.en: Two disinterested parties are needed to verify these document ． for us.
sentences.cn: 我们需要两个公正的团体来查证这些文件.

sentences.en: We had both become jaded, disinterested, and disillusioned.
sentences.cn: 我们俩都已经倦了，腻了，也死心了。

words.tran_cn: 公正地；无私地；无偏见地
公正无私；漠不关心；不感兴趣

trans.tran_cn: 公正的，无私的，不感兴趣的，不关心的
trans.tran_en: able to judge a situation fairly because you are not concerned with gaining any personal advantage from it

trans.tran_cn: 使不再有利害关系，使无兴趣(disinterest的过去分词)
